location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, HM Chargé d'affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a receipt for money received from the Resident and the Prince Royal of Persia for cloth from the East India Company.The letter also includes a detailed record of the financial transactions between Willock, as Chargé d'affaires to the Court of Persia, and the Resident at Bushire.
